column2: While I was reading the narrative, I could easily picture the events in it taking place.
column3: While I was reading the narrative, activity going on in the room around me was on my mind.
column4: I could picture myself in the scene of the events described in the narrative.
column5: I was mentally involved in the narrative while reading it.
column6: After finishing the narrative, I found it easy to put it out of my mind.
column7: I wanted to learn how the narrative ended.
column9: I found myself thinking of ways the narrative could have turned out differently.
column10: I found my mind wandering while reading the narrative.
column11: The events in the narrative are relevant to my everyday life.
column12: The events in the narrative have changed my life.
